title: MBMBaM 595: Gasoline of the Body
description:
There’s an awful amount of blood in this episode. Like an astounding amount. Picture it. No, that’s . . . too much blood. Why are you thinking about that much blood?

Suggested talking points: Dying in the Applebees, BlartWatch, Who Doesn’t Like Bailamos, Beuiff, Chunky Donut, Bed Bath and the Great Beyond

National Black Women’s Justice Institute: https://www.nbwji.org/

Huntington Childrens Museum: https://hcmkids.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
